title: Make CONTRIBUTING.md prerequisites more accurate
body:
## Bug Report

On MacOS building TiKV from source doesn't require gcc, if you run `gcc version` on MacOS it actually points to clang.

### What version of TiKV are you using?
master branch

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
MacOS M3

### Steps to reproduce

### What did you expect?
Doc can be more accurate

### What did happened?
